supporting_spans: The night before the mate was hanged he pressed a dagger engraved with his family crest into the boy’s hand.
Ayrton suddenly sprang to his feet. In his hand was a revolver. A report was heard; and Glenarvan fell, struck by a bullet.
contradicting_spans: Ayrton suddenly sprang to his feet. In his hand was a revolver. A report was heard; and Glenarvan fell, struck by a bullet.
reasoning: Contradiction (factual): The evidence contradicts the claim that Ben Joyce was hanged the night before the mate pressed a dagger into the boy's hand.
